entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
